faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion CRM Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion CRM Training covers key modules including Sales, Marketing, Service, Commerce, Configure Price Quote (CPQ), Social, Functional Setup Manager (FSM), Business Processes, Analytics, and Hands-on Case Studies. A complete syllabus is available in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are conducted Monday to Saturday, 1 hour per day. This structured schedule ensures continuous learning and hands-on experience in Oracle Fusion CRM implementation.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, weekend-only batches are not available. All classes are held Monday through Saturday for consistent progress and in-depth understanding.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer recorded sessions for self-paced learning. Please note that live Q&A sessions are not included in the self-paced format for Oracle Fusion CRM.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internships are provided based on mock evaluation performance. Internships involve practical experience on Oracle Fusion CRM real-time business scenarios.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No. Oracle Fusion CRM Training is offered as a complete course to ensure a comprehensive understanding of all CX suite features and configurations.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer resume building support specifically for CRM roles, highlighting your project experience and CRM application capabilities.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. A personal system is needed to access the Oracle Fusion instance for hands-on practice and configuration exercises.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. This course is beginner-friendly. A basic understanding of CRM or sales processes can be helpful but is not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes. The training starts with foundational concepts and gradually covers advanced CRM functionalities, suitable for beginners and working professionals alike.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes. We provide complete placement support including mock interviews, interview preparation, and resume optimization for Oracle Fusion CRM roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle Fusion Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide expert guidance and study materials to help you prepare for Oracle Fusion CRM certification exams.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes. You will have 1-year access to recordings and receive detailed notes, process documentation, and relevant reference materials.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide CRM-specific interview questions and conduct mock interviews to help you prepare for real-time job roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll get 6 months of access to the Oracle Fusion instance for practicing CRM modules and configurations.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can rejoin any upcoming batch of Oracle Fusion CRM Training within your 1-year course access at no extra cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes. After successfully completing the training, you will receive an official Oracle Fusion CRM Training Certificate from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding knowledge is required. This course is focused on functional and configuration aspects of Oracle Fusion CRM, making it suitable for both technical and non-technical learners.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, one-on-one training is available upon request. Fees for personalized sessions vary based on schedule and duration.
